articles.title: A 2-Million-Solar-Mass Black Hole Just Gave Up Its Deepest Secret - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A spinning black hole just revealed its inner chaos, XRISM’s image goes deeper than any X-ray telescope before it.
articles.content: The feat was made possible by XRISMs high-resolution Resolve instrument, working in tandem with ESAs XMM-Newton and NASAs NuSTAR. Together, these observatories isolated the warped X-ray signatures of… [+5763 chars]
